name: v1.18.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update Github Actions by @LKaemmerling in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/165
* Add tests for Python 3.11 by @LKaemmerling in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/167


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/compare/v1.18.0...v1.18.1

name: v1.18.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove use of external mock module by @s-t-e-v-e-n-k in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/162
* document installation path via conda-forge by @s-m-e in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/149
* Drop # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- from files by @jonasdlindner in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/154
* Simplify Requirement Constraints by @LKaemmerling in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/163
* Add validation helper for Label Values/Keys by @LKaemmerling in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/164

## New Contributors
* @s-t-e-v-e-n-k made their first contribution in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/162
* @s-m-e made their first contribution in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/149
* @jonasdlindner made their first contribution in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/154

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/compare/v1.17.0...v1.18.0

name: v1.17.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add primary IP support by @LKaemmerling in https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/pull/160


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hetznercloud/hcloud-python/compare/v1.16.0...v1.17.0

name: v1.16.0
body: * Feature: Add support for Load Balancer DNS PTRs

name: v1.15.0
body: * Feature: Add support for Placement Groups

name: v1.14.1
body:
* Bugfix: Fix crash on extra fields in public_net response
* Improvement: Format code with black

name: v1.14.0
body: * Feature: Add support for Firewall rule descriptions

name: v1.13.0
body:
* Feature: Add support for Firewall Protocols ESP and GRE
* Feature: Add support for Image Type APP
* Feature: Add support for creating Firewalls with Firewalls
* Feature: Add support for Label Selectors in Firewalls
* Improvement: Improve handling of underlying TCP connections. Now for every client instance, a single TCP connection is used instead of one per call.

* Note: Support for Python 2.7 and Python 3.5 was removed

name: v1.12.0
body: * Feature: Add support for managed Certificates

name: v1.11.0
body:
* Feature: Add support for Firewalls
* Feature: Add `primary_disk_size` to `Server` Domain

name: v1.10.0
body:
* Feature: Add `include_deprecated` filter to `get_list` and `get_all` on `ImagesClient`
* Feature: Add vSwitch support to `add_subnet` on `NetworksClient`
* Feature: Add subnet type constants to `NetworkSubnet` domain (`NetworkSubnet.TYPE_CLOUD`, `NetworkSubnet.TYPE_VSWITCH`)

name: v1.9.1
body: - Bugfix: BoundLoadBalancer serialization failed when using IP targets

name: v1.9.0
body:
* Feature: Add `included_traffic`, `outgoing_traffic` and `ingoing_traffic` properties to Load Balancer domain
* Feature: Add `change_type`-method to `LoadBalancersClient`
* Feature: Add support for `LoadBalancerTargetLabelSelector`
* Feature: Add support for `LoadBalancerTargetLabelSelector`

name: v1.8.2
body: * Fix: Loosen up the requirements.

name: v1.8.1
body:
* Fix Load Balancer Client.
* Fix: Unify setting of request parameters within `get_list` methods.

name: v1.8.0
body:
**Attention: Do not use v1.8.0! It contains several bugs regarding Load Balancers. Please use v1.8.1 instead!** 

- Feature: Add Load Balancers
- Feature: Add Certificates

name: v1.7.1
body: * Feature: Add requests 2.23 support

name: v1.7.0
body:
* Feature: Add support for the optional 'networks' parameter on server creation.
* Feature: Add python 3.9 support
* Feature: Add subnet type `cloud`

name: v1.6.3
body:
* Feature: Add 'created' property to SSH Key domain
* Fix: Remove ISODatetime Descriptor because it leads to wrong dates

name: v1.6.2
body: * Fix: future dependency requirement was too strict

name: v1.6.1
body: * Fix: python-dateutil dependency requirement was too strict

name: v1.6.0
body: * Feature: Add missing `get_by_name` on `FloatingIPsClient`

name: v1.5.0
body:
* Fix: ServersClient.create_image fails when specifying the `labels`
* Feature: Add support for `name` on Floating IPs

name: v1.4.1
body:
* Fix: Documentation for `NetworkRoute` domain was missing

* Fix: `requests` dependency requirement was to strict

name: v1.4.0
body:
* Feature: Add `mac_address` to Server PrivateNet domain

* Feature: Add python 3.8 support

name: v1.3.0
body:
* Feature: Add status filter for servers, images and volumes
* Feature: Add 'created' property to Floating IP domain
* Feature: Add 'Networks' support

name: v1.2.1
body: - Fix: BoundVolume.server server property now casted to the 'BoundServer'.

name: v1.2.0
body:
* Feature: Add `get_by_fingerprint`-method for ssh keys
* Fix: Create Floating IP with location raises an error because no action was given.

name: v1.1.0
body: * Feature: Add `STATUS`-constants for server and volume status
Fix: Ignore unknown fields in API response instead of raising an error

name: v1.0.0
body:
Initial Release
You can find the documentation under https://hcloud-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
